interface.label: RSS fields

messages.content: You are a AI and automation Tools expert. Summarize this article {{31.url}} in a way that makes it easy to create social media posts from the output. Be sure to include the URLs for the actual tools mentioned only when relevant and not the article you are summarizing.

Act as a professional video script editor. Review and verify that the script you just produced is written in a way that ensures the created video should be at least 30 seconds but not more than 59 seconds.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

spec.name: voiceOverText
spec.label: Voice Over Text
spec.default: The hills are alive with the sound of music, with songs they have sung for a thousand years. The hills fill my heart with the sound of music. My heart wants to sing every song it hears

spec.default: The hills are alive with the sound of music

messages.content: You're a social media expert and your job is to write a engaging post for Instagram from the following article summary:  {{32.choices[].message.content}}. You do not have to summarize the entire article in the post. You can choose one tool or interesting point to highlight in the post. Your audience is entrepreneurs who are interested in business automation and AI tools. Be sure to use appropriate hashtags and emojis. Do not exceed 500 characters in the post.
